name: niem-model-api-specification
description: Mock API specification for the NIEM model structure

scripts.build: npm run convert && npm run deref && npm run test && npm run docs && echo "'npm run jsdocs' must be run manually as needed because it requires updating the output by hand."
scripts.docs: redoc-cli bundle openapi.yaml && mv redoc-static.html docs/index.html && replace "ReDoc documentation" "NIEM Model API" docs/index.html
scripts.convert: npm run convert:schemas && npm run convert:openapi
scripts.deref: json-dereference -s schemas/api-schema.yaml -o schemas/api-schema-deref.json && js-beautify schemas/api-schema-deref.json -o schemas/api-schema-deref.json
scripts.test: npm run test:schemas && npm run test:examples && npm run test:openapi
